resources.string: Stream your favourite songs and videos on Music Box
Your favourite songs and videos are just a click away
Receive notifications on new musics and videos
Time to see what you can get from Music Box

"The following are the changes made to
 Music Box so far : 

"
"Release: Android 1.1.1 
 Release date: 30th September 2019 

 New Features 
 *Support for file Download 

 Improvements 
 *Added libraries for improved user experience 

 Bug Fixes 
 *Fixed musics and video lazy load 
 *Fixed lottie bugs
